name: Bad Teeth Doctor and Hero Dentist Office - Help Celebrity with your little hand
name_original: Bad Teeth Doctor and Hero Dentist Office - Help Celebrity with your little hand
description:
Little heros go to the Dentist! Help them ALL get shiny sparkling teeth so they can show off their famous smile when they save the world!
Take photo for your friends or yourself, solve the teeth issue with same fun steps! It's funny, share with your friends.

Get the game NOW!!!!! help the little heros: S.Man,Ninjia,Pirate,Zorro,SuperMan, Spider Man, Bat Man, Jack Sparrow.... and more character comming....
